Title: I am Hurrying I'm Almost Nearly Ready!
Plot: Lola for some reason isn't hurrying up to get ready for school, although she says she is. Lola wants some time to color in her coloring book, feed her goldfish, and do countless other things, forcing Charlie to wait. With time getting tight, Charlie intervenes so that Lola can really hurry up and make it to school.
GuestStars: Morgan Gayle, Ryan Harris, Enn Reitel, Dan Chambers
